customer_reviews.title: My unit had a defect - it occasionally produces a ...
customer_reviews.text: My unit had a defect - it occasionally produces a loud buzzing noise (via the aux audio output to the speakers). I sent the unit back to ASUS but they returned it back to me unfixed because they couldn't find the fault. I have since found a solution to the problem: play music at zero volume at the background. It then somehow shuts down this noise problem.

customer_reviews.title: this is a great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Assuming you understand the advantages and limitations of ChromeOS, this is a great little machine. I bought it mostly out of curiosity, to mount on the back of a new monitor I'd bought, but I'm now using it as my primary computer about 80% of the time. Very good option for a non-techie friend or relative, or someone who just uses online services. Great performance and 5-6 second boot-up time. Presumably there's a fan inside, but I've never heard it, even when playing HD video. Good selection of ports too. The biggest criticism I can lay against it is that I don't like the power button.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B
